channel.title: Is Tupac Dead?
channel.description:
Some Youtube videos state he is STILL alive, while others PROVE he's dead. What do you think?
I personally think he's still alive.

item.title: Is Tupac Dead?
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

[quote=“justinxg27, post:50, topic:368966”][quote author=`Aaron link=topic=465097.msg3402860#msg3402860 date=1290104445]

[quote author=justinxg27 link=topic=465097.msg3402563#msg3402563 date=1290061804]

[quote author=`Aaron link=topic=465097.msg3402543#msg3402543 date=1290059565]

It’s a conspiracy.
[/quote]only idiots believe illuminati is real.

Go fuck yourself.

No, seriously why?
[/quote]You believe in Illuminati?

Of course i do, ever since i started using ecstasy and cocaine it’s a good topic to talk about when you are blitzed.
[/quote]Yuck, Junkie.[/quote]

You’re a fucking retard.

item.title: Is Tupac Dead?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“Rixxx, post:2, topic:369031”][quote author=Exion link=topic=465097.msg3402335#msg3402335 date=1290042776]

@JME - That songs bring back a lot of memories to the past I had. Tupac is dead, at least I know that he would not lie to his fan’s. At least I would hope that he isn’t lieing to us. Nevertheless, he will be missed and was the greatest rapper on the earth. I’m going to be honest and state that the stuff that rapper’s come up with today; I’m not liking the music. Thus moving onto another genre of music.

Eminem is the greatest rapper on Earth.
[/quote][/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Is Tupac Dead?
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

You can’t compare Kurt Cobain and Tupac. They were both legends and both inspired a lot of people. That’s straying from the topic however. Yes, I think he’s dead.

@JME - That songs bring back a lot of memories to the past I had. Tupac is dead, at least I know that he would not lie to his fan’s. At least I would hope that he isn’t lieing to us. Nevertheless, he will be missed and was the greatest rapper on the earth. I’m going to be honest and state that the stuff that rapper’s come up with today; I’m not liking the music. Thus moving onto another genre of music.
[/quote]
Eminem is the greatest rapper on Earth.[/quote]
I’m not going to get into this much. Though all I can tell you is that Eminem has grown up, which is about time. He’s started to make sense in his music, he is a free styler. Nevertheless, I don’t think he is the best. That is my opinion though, so yeah.

item.title: Is Tupac Dead?
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

en.wikipedia.org

Tupac Shakur

Tupac Amaru Shakur (/ˈtuːpɑːk ʃəˈkʊər/ TOO-pahk shə-KOOR; born Lesane Parish Crooks; June 16, 1971 – September 13, 1996), also known by his stage names Tupac, 2Pac and Makaveli, was an American rapper and actor. Shakur sold over 75 million records worldwide, making him one of the best-selling music artists of all time. His double-disc albums All Eyez on Me (1996) and his Greatest Hits (1998) are among the best-selling albums in the United States. Shakur is consistently ranked as one o Shakur bega...

Read full topic

item.title: Is Tupac Dead?
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

facepalm. Yes, he died, it was on the news. Hence all the interviews with rappers like eminem about tupac dieing.

He was shot like 9 times, sure that’s not much.

And yes, ofc he got a funeral, he was the best rapper to ever live; powerful meaning in amazing poetry… some people could cry to his music,

Yes, he died. 15 odd years ago

Read full topic

item.title: Is Tupac Dead?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Of course he’s fricken dead.

[quote=“Javafire, post:25, topic:368966”][quote author=`Aaron link=topic=465097.msg3401209#msg3401209 date=1289944539]

wtf, this guy isn’t kurt cobain, no one cares about some almost unknown MC from the 80s. Bunch of bitches if you ask me who never shoulda been known in the first place.

It has been said time and time again, you’re probably the most fucking retarded member on this forum. You have nothing but assumptions from your “facts”. You’re always trying to bring out the negative in every conversation you have with another member on this website, Tupac was far better than Kurt Cobain, and Kurt Cobain was also a legend and stop your bullshit already.
[/quote]
you know that isn’t true, and my affiliations are of higher magnitude. I’m actually basing my information on facts weather you like it or not. Fucking idiot.[/quote]

He’s not some unknown 80’s MC. He is probably the most well known rapper ever to exist. Which facts? The one’s you pulled from your ass?

Just because you don’t like his music doesn’t mean others cant. And you know, compared to a lot of shit out there these days, his lyrics were more then just acting like a fake gangster. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ay9BWM8lwOA
Even Oprah could appreciate that song.

I know why so many people would dislike rap. But don’t put down others who enjoy it.

Read full topic
